responses: hi there, how can i help you

patterns: Which mess is closest to the blocks?
Which mess has ac and is nearest to sp?
How is the food at FC1
responses: FC1 is an air conditioned mess located near the Student plaza and also has Quess. The food quality of this mess is average and it is only preferred due to the location and air-conditioning.

patterns: Which mess is closest to the blocks?
Which mess is the most accessible?
Which mess is the most preferred?
responses: Apoorva is located in between blocks 8 and 7. It is accesible to blocks 14 and 15 as well; making it the most preferred mess as it has Fc2's menu and you can a la carte as well!

patterns: What is for dinner in fc2?
What is for dinner in apoorva?
What is for dinner in ashraya?
responses: There is Paneer Butter Masala, Aloo Matar and ice cream as today's dinner! If you dont like the dinner you can always call them at 99999999 to order!

patterns: what is for dinner in Fc1?
responses: There's Beetroot and Soya masala for dinner in Fc1 today.
You can view the apoorva menu here -> and call them on 099999999 to order your delicacy! They are open from 12 pm to 11pm!

patterns: Which mess is near to boys blocks?
Which mess has the Indian Kitchen?
responses: Fc2 is located in front of Block 16 and 17, and behind block 15. It is the most accesible to boys' blocks. It's food is managed by the Indian Kitchen.
You can view the Indian kitchen menu here -> and call them on 099999999 to order your delicacy! They are open from 12 pm to 11pm!
